title: Noam Chomsky Linguistics Interviewed in Barcelona
description:
Noam Chomsky Linguistics interview at Hotel Colon in Barcelona Spain. Recorded in  1992.

Source: 

Noam Chomsky is an American linguist, philosopher, cognitive scientist, political commentator, social justice activist, and anarcho-syndicalist advocate. Sometimes described as the father.
